message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a very reasonable price of $13,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $13,500 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. While I appreciate your offer, the price you're suggesting is quite a bit lower than I'm comfortable with.  Could you meet me halfway at $11,500?
I understand your concerns, Alice, but $11,500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer at $9,750. Can you consider this revised offer?
